description:
Spring Chinook and summer steelhead will be captured in ODFWs fish trap at Sherar Falls.  They will implanted with a radio tag and/or PIT tag.  Radio tagged fish will be tracked as they move up the Deschutes River and into tributaries.  Of interest is overwinter holding locations for summer steelhead and summer holding areas for spring Chinook.  PIT tags will be recorded at several arrays within the Deschutes Subbasin.  Data will be used to characterize migration patterns and spawning areas.

Radio telemetry efforts will include fixed telemetry sites (in user sample 11269), boat surveys between Pelton Re-regulating Dam and Warm Springs River (rkm 161 to rkm 136), road surveys along the Deschutes River, Warm Springs River and Shitike Creek, and aerial surveys over the subbasin.

userSamples.name: CTWS RM&E - Sample area for spring Chinook and summer steelhead migration patterns

title: CTWS RM&E - Radio telemetry survey to determine migration patterns of wild adult spring Chinook and summer steelhead in lower Deschutes Subbasin
